body_html: In the line self.lstm1(x, (self.h0, self.c0)), at least one of the inputs is on CPU while at least one other input is on GPU. They have to all be on one or the other; you can add a print(x.is_cuda, self.h0.is_cuda, self.c0.is_cuda) before that line to see which ones are where.
